ALARM_TEXT: The bridge allows users to lock their ETH in a smart contract on Ethereum and mint secretETH. Below you can unwrap your secretETH and receive ETH tokens back link.
INFO_TEXT: The bridge allows users to lock their ETH in a smart contract on Ethereum and mint secretETH. Below you can unwrap your secretETH and receive ETH tokens back link.
SETTING_DESCRIPTION: You can provide this app with access to the chosen addresses associated with your account.
ERROR_TEXT_1: Error: Returned error: insufficient funds for transfer
ERROR_DESCRIPTION_1: This error happens when you are trying to swap tokens with insufficient allowance, or when your address has insufficient funds.
ERROR_TIP_1: Check your available balance and make sure it’s sufficient. Also, ensure you’ve given the contract allowance to spend the amount of funds you're attempting to swap with.
ERROR_TEXT_2: Error: Returned error: operation is not available
ERROR_TIP_2: If the error persists, try again later
ERROR_DESCRIPTION_3: Your input amount is insufficient. It might be the case that prices are updating too fast when and your slippage tolerance is too low
ERROR_TIP_3: Increase your slippage tolerance a bit and try again.
ERROR_TIP_DEFAULT: Make sure you have more tokens in your wallet than you intend to swap, or try to swap a lower amount.
ADDRESS_ERROR_TEXT: Seems like you don't have any BSC addresses imported into
ADDRESS_ERROR_TIP: Go to 'Add address' section and import BSC addresses of your choice with private key,seed phrase or hardware wallet
SWAP_ANYWAY_ALARM: For swap to proceed, please increase the slippage tolerance in
